title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Draymond Green on Steph, KD, Finals Preview w/ Doug Gottlieb, Best Bets w/ Chad Millman
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Draymond Green on Steph, KD, Finals Preview w/ Doug Gottlieb, Best Bets w/ Chad Millman
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, 3-time NBA champion - and host of The Draymond Green Show - Draymond Green (3:00) on how the Warriors are preparing for Boston ahead of the Finals, his feelings about KD’s decision to leave for Brooklyn, what Steph Curry critics don’t understand about his greatness, how they were able to wear down Luka Doncic in the Western Conference Finals Also, Draymond puts Colin on the hot seat over an old Warriors take that didn’t age particularly well.

Then, Doug Gottlieb (Doug Gottlieb Show) (31:00) explains if the Celtics have enough offense to hang with the Warriors in the Finals, how the less heralded college players are crucial to both Finals teams, and how Marcus Smart and Draymond fill similar roles.

Finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman (46:00) runs down the best single bet for the Finals, which team the sharps are loading up on to win the series, if Steph could win Finals MVP.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
